gt: Appropriate use of blogs "can empower students to become more analytical and critical; through actively responding to Internet materials, students can define their positions in the context of others' writings as well as outline their own perspectives on particular issues (Oravec, 2002).<|eng|><|zho|>"适当使用博客，"可以使学生变得更善于分析和进行思辨；通过积极回应网络材料，学生们可以在他人文章的上下文语境中找到自己的立场，并能够针对特定问题提出自己的观点（Oravec, 2002）。"
response:
Appropriate use of blogs can enable students to become more and more interested and involved. Through actively responding to the Internet, students can define themselves in the context of others. In addition, appropriate use of blogs can also help students to become more aware of the importance of the Internet in their lives.
